website_summaries.verdict: A quality filtered showerhead, perfect for areas with hard/high chemical water.
pros: Effectively reduces harsh chemicals and other harmful impurities
Great for softer skin and hair
Durable 5-foot hose makes for a convenient reach when cleansing
cons: Showerhead is a bit heavy and may droop when mounted
Navigating the spray settings can be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Please check the weight!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the benefits of this filter, but please be very careful with this thing over your head or you have a child. This is heavier than my 24 oz. framing hammer. Would make a good weapon in a pinch. But seriously needs re-engineered as a shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts break and must be replaced to use shower head
customer_reviews.text: Plastic part which cradles the shower head broke in half rendering the entire apparatus useless unless the part can be replaced. It wax either a flawed plastic casting in some way or very bad quality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this a couple days ago and can't really speak to its effect on my skin and hair. What I can say, though, is that it was really easy to install, and the shower head puts out a nice flow of water. I have also noticed, when I rinse and squeegee my shower with this, is that the glass seems so much cleaner than with my old, conventional shower head. Edit two weeks later: I can now say that I have noticed a definite improvement in my skin after using this -- much less dry!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not safe.
customer_reviews.text: Dangerous due to extremely heavy head that rests on a flimsy holder that is poorly made and doesn't hold it securely. I returned mine and got something else that I'm thrilled with.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Truly Disappointed - Showerhead thread does not match the original Culligan hose
customer_reviews.text: Why 0-1 star? The Original Culligan Showerhead thread DOES NOT MATCH the original Culligan hose. It's either the showerhead grey plastic thread defect during manufacturing (uneven cutting) or Hose provided doesn't match the showerhead. So, Culligan suggested me: to purchase another adapter or thread $18.95 to support it? But the main problem is thread defect. The Culligan hose given supposed to fit the showerhead but it doesn't. oh well ~ Check out the video below, truly disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Good filter, but plastic fittings????
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Culligan filter because I've had their whole house installations (tank) and found them effective. The filter on this unit seems to work well enough, but it's heavy, which is a problem when you have plastic fittings with an adjustable ball joint. What genius thought using a plastic tightening ring instead of brass was a good idea either doesn't give a damn or failed engineering. Don't make junk just to keep the cost down. Do it right, or don't do it at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: NYC Daddy-O

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Broke in Two Months!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Broke after two months. Other reviews are spot on. Listen to them. The design is flawed. The cheap weak plastic cannot take the weight of the filter.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLIFE

customer_reviews.title: No change in water
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shower head because it says it reduces scale and I hoped to reduce the hardness of my well water. After using it for a week or so and noticing no difference I pulled out my water test strips and found that I noticed no difference because there was no difference in water hardness. So now I have this very heavy shower head for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Janine G

customer_reviews.title: Droopy shower head
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these for many, many years with not a problem in the world. Finally self-destructed, so I bought another, expecting the same wonderful product. This new incarnation has a terrible design flaw. The ball does not tighten in the socket, not allowing the ultra-heavy shower head to stay up. It just droops down requiring you to stand against the wall to get under the showerhead. No amount of tightening helps. Culligan sent us two (!) replacement joints, but they were same construction, so neither was any better. Finally gave up and contacted Amazon for a refund. Back to the Waterpik...
customer_reviews.author: piedpifer

customer_reviews.title: Liked This Product
customer_reviews.text: I like this shower head except that it is not wide enough. I felt myself dancing around underneath it to keep my whole body getting wet under it. I ended up returning it. I'm going to order a bigger rain type head this time. I like a full shower flow all over my body. But there was a lot of power and all the settings were strong. The clean water didnt do anything for my hair like I had high hopes for. I'm going to assume there is just no hope for my hair. Not the shower heads fault. All in all I like this product except for the width of the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: We moved into a rental house with terribly hard water
customer_reviews.text: I waited for four weeks to post my review on this item so I knew if it really worked or If I was just hoping it was. We moved into a rental house with terribly hard water. No softener. Our dishes, clothes, skin and hair have paid the price. I found this shower head filter and took a chance and within a week we noticed a difference. Our skin isn’t as itchy, our hair and skin isn’t as dry! It does the job and it’s super easy to install. Actually, I think my husband installed while talking in the phone! Five stars and a family of happy customers!
customer_reviews.author: Twinkler

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: This shower head makes a loud high pitched noise that you can’t escape I thought it was just me but have seen in other reviews people had a similar issue. I still like it and have grown to ignore the sound for the most part I would highly recommend this to anyone. I have been using culligan filtered shower heads for years I was happy when I found this one that can be hand held. I can tell the difference in my hair. I would recommend all of their shower heads and some of my family members have switched to this too. Your skin is your biggest organ!
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: If you have hard water, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 6 stars if I could. That is how much of a difference it made. I live in Germany, and knew we had hard water, but didnt realize how much of a difference that made on my hair. So much softer, even without using shampoo or conditioner. My beard, my girlfriend's hair, it became a massive difference. Of course I dont have to spend my weekends scrubbing calcium anymore either, so that is pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.author: ocktomas

customer_reviews.title: Given the great results of the first
customer_reviews.text: I already had replaced my old standard shower head with the non hose version of this one and there were no issues. Given the great results of the first, I was already half convinced this would be just as good--and it was. Five stars and the filter does a great job of providing a clear (no pun intended) difference between Los Angeles public water and the filtered water through these. It's also nice to know the spray nozzles never clog and never need to be rounded out with a metal punch or similar item.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thames

customer_reviews.title: A bit topheavy, but great overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I LOVE this shower head. I live in an area with very hard water and occasional slightly rust colored water, and it has a bad effect on my hair and skin, and the inside of the shower. With this filtered shower head, I deal with less soap scum, and shinier hair and skin. I do wish it was a little less unwieldy and heavy, but I'm not sure how that could be avoided with a filter.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Broke after just a couple months!!
customer_reviews.text: The piece that holds the shower head on has broken off.. it appears to be made from weak plastic. Now i have to hold the shower head the whole time i shower. I don’t know how to get in touch with the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my hair
customer_reviews.text: This shower head is great. It has transformed the quality of my water, which has also transformed the quality of my hair! My hair always felt like it had a film left on it, but not it is super Soft and easy to manage. I installed this on my own within 10 minutes... my only complaint is our water pressure has decreased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Put an end to chlorine irritated skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have heavily concentrated chlorine in my shower water. It irritates my skin and eyes. I’ve been looking for a shower wand with a filter to eliminate as much concentrated chlorine, as possible, but every time I’d buy a new shower filter, one after another, I had no success. Finally, I put my faith into Culligan, and I was pleasantly surprised. Not only did my skin and eye irritants stop, but the chlorine smell was nonexistent. I’m very happy with this product, and so is my skin.
customer_reviews.author: M M

customer_reviews.title: Great showerhead with filter and hand held option - until plastic parts break
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this showerhead for the water filter, hand held option, and different pressure settings. Great for showering and for washing larger items that do not fit in the sink. We love it. However, it is now 6 months since our purchase and plastic parts have broken. We will try again with another one and keep looking for a better version.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly888

customer_reviews.title: Hello Better Hair Days
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy. A bit worried that water consumption will increase going from a low flow to this filtered spray. Overall very impressed after my first use. My thinning blonde hair was much softer and manageable. Great for a household that can't install a water softener. Price point was a little high, but I look forward to much better results! Make sure you read and keep the installation and trouble shooting guide for the filter. Thanks Culligan!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great filter/poor design
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. The shower filter itself does what is promised. Our water is extremely hard. This has made a huge difference in my skin and hair. No longer dried out. But the design is flawed just as most reviewers said. The shower head is too heavy to be supported by the holder. It's a balancing act to get it to stay secure. Just because I like the hand held shower doesn't mean I want to hold it all through my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Senior Citizen

customer_reviews.title: They help hair softness in harsh water
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for months. I was unaware of it's working until it needed to be replaced. I noticed my hair was rougher as I got under the shower spray and my hair got wet. I replaced the filter and it is an amazing difference...the first shower. I didnt notice the difference using my first filter. I think that was just expecting an unrealistic result. However, I did notice when the first filter needed to be replaced. For the poor quality of water we have here, my showers are again kind to my hair.
customer_reviews.author: nosey275

customer_reviews.title: Not very practical.
customer_reviews.text: The head is too heavy and very difficult to get it to stay in position on the cradle. Chrome threads barely hold on pipe, even after using 2 ton epoxy. I have that problem with other brackets that screw onto the pipe. To keep the shower head ball swivel tight, I end up loosening the thread while tightening the ball nut and then the whole thing leaks and rotates. The spray jets are too large and it guzzles water compared to my other hand shower head. The filter would be better installed at the other end of the hose where it wouldn't weigh down the head. Am looking for another, more practical unit with finer spray jets.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Filter, Buy 2!
customer_reviews.text: Replacing previous product same brand/type, like Culligan shower filter products, last a long time, though, need to soak in vinaigrette every 3 months to get rid of calcium marks on shower head and hose. Keeps skin and hair soft w/ chlorine removal. Very highly recommend this product, especially in hard water desert areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Arizona customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in t the quality of this product! Have had the same shower head in the past with no problems. This one was difficult to install because of the poor quality of the collar that the hose fits onto. It's made of plastic! Specs indicate strong water flow. That is wrong! I get very weak water flow! Specs indicate 5 flow settings. I only get 2! For the price I paid the quality should be a bit better! Will not buy this item again
customer_reviews.author: Deb Wiser

customer_reviews.title: Rubber grip fell off, fell out of holster for no reason causing injury to toddler
customer_reviews.text: I have had two major issues with this showerhead. First, the flow is less than desirable, but it was awesome after I had my husband remove the flow restrictor. Second, after about a month of use by two adults and a toddler, the little rubber grip that holds the showerhead in place fell off and the showerhead would just fall out of the holster for no reason (while not in use). While I was giving my toddler a bath, it fell out of it's holster without provocation and struck my toddler (3.5 years old) hard on the shoulder and collar bone causing a pretty serious injury and instant bruising. :/
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: So glad it lives up to its claims
customer_reviews.text: It's what I needed since I could smell our city water (nasty) and I was itching after showering until I was told about filtered shower heads. I researched until I found a happy medium for effectiveness and cost. I actually got 2 because my daughter and her husband were having issues in their city. It works fine. I'd give it 5 stars but I feel it's a little top heavy and am concerned about in future of it not holding up. I had read reviews and some said to remove the little gray ring so water pressure not inhibited but we put it back as it was fine with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Corianda B.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied- Won't buy this again
customer_reviews.text: The replacement filters for this do not fit right, its stuck and i can't change it. The model number of the filters are supposed to go with this shower head but it doesn't. I wouldn't recommend this product and won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Pena

customer_reviews.title: I love it, & the price is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: In my efforts to stop the aging process, this was literally my first purchase. It just makes sense that if you want clear, clean, glowing, healthy, youthful skin & hair, you must have clean water! I love this shower head, not just because my hair & skin look & feel good, but also for the convenience of the hand-held sprayer, the different settings are awesome for sore muscles after a workout. The filter works so well, and really has minimized the soap scum/hard water deposits in my shower, eliminating the need for so much scrubbing on cleaning day. An added bonus is that giving my dog a bath is so much faster & easier now!
customer_reviews.author: Pearly

customer_reviews.title: Clean water clean
customer_reviews.text: I live where the water is excessively hard. This softens it and makes it easier on my skin. Install was a two minute affair of unscrewing the old shower head and attaching this one.
customer_reviews.author: Father Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great filter, saves me money on lotion and dandruff shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Works great, nice clean filtered water for my showers. Purchased the Sprite filter at a local Home Depot, and didn't really notice a difference when in the shower. Once I installed the Culligan filter, it was a very noticeable difference. The reason I purchased a shower filter was due to a noticeable change in my cities water quality. I started getting dry skin and flakes on my scalp. Actually spent some money on lotions etc... Then gave this a shot, and KaBlammo, no more dry skin or flakes, took about 2-3 days to completely go away. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Jack

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...but hard to get filter out.
customer_reviews.text: Best handheld shower and filter I’ve ever bought. I’ve had a few. UPDATE: BUT, I have an EXTREMELY hard time getting the filter to come out of the head. I bought this in February and have to change the filter almost every month because the water pressure gets very low. I’ve removed the flow restrictor too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works great, feels wonderful !
customer_reviews.text: We have hard water so I got the fixed Culligan showerhead to try. It worked so well I bought this handheld. Our skin feels softer, hair feels clean and soft. I love the massage setting at the end of a workday for my back. The filter is super easy to change when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower head. Upgrade to this from the Culligan WSH-C125 Wall-Mount and I have never been happier. I find that it removes a lot of the particulates from the water. Since installing this I have experienced skin that is less dry and my hair feels softer. Also this is better over the Culligan WSH-C125 Wall-Mount because I'm over 6 feet tall and with the position of the WSHC125 I had to almost duck under it. With the HSHC135 I fit perfectly under the water and can remove the head when cleaning the shower and rinse hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: slider1578

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does every thing it should
customer_reviews.text: I had one before however went to the company to get a new one. Said they did not do any handhelds anymore. I liked my last one so much I decided to ask Amazon and there it was. I ordered it and it is great. Good and solid I can change the filters . Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Unangst

customer_reviews.title: Feeling Clean again....
customer_reviews.text: Living in the country and dealing with well water, this is just the best thing that has happened to my showers! I can't put into words the wonderful feeling of being REALLY clean and having hair that will actually allow me to comb and style! Wonderful, thank you Culligan for coming up with this idea since we couldn't afford your whole house service.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Jools

customer_reviews.title: This was SO needed!
customer_reviews.text: We've lived in our new house for a year with hard water, and my hair has gotten so damaged from it. I noticed the difference immediately with this filtered shower head! I love it. I can actually rinse all the conditioner out of my hair and comb my hair out without a billion tangles! My husband even notices a huge difference in his hair too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too top heavy, won't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed with this after my first shower with it. Installation was easy enough and it has enough water pressure for me but the thing is too top heavy because of the filter that the joint can't hold it in place. The weight of the shower head causes it to slowly point all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since 2015. I think my hair and skin do feel and look much better since I started using this. At times I have a little trouble removing the filter, but other than that, so far so good. I recently got the Bopai Vacuum Suction Cup Shower Head Wall Mount Holder so that I can position the shower head lower. Both work great together.
customer_reviews.author: Syn

customer_reviews.title: It is really amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter has long hair, and our local water provider has fairly hard water. We purchased this to help with her hair which is perpetually dry and split. We have used a multitude of conditioners and all have helped but not "fixed" the problem. Short of cutting all her hair off we were at our wits end. Read an article about how soft water helped with this, so we decided to give this a try. One week in and we can already tell a significant difference in the texture of her hair. It is really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Reid

customer_reviews.title: nice high quality shower head
customer_reviews.text: this shower head puts out a nice stream of water. I usually remove the water restrictor on shower heads but I didn't need to do that on this one. One small issue: it's fairly heavy so the mounting bracket tends to sag. But it's easily adjusted and will hold a position long enough to take a shower. Not sure if the filter is doing much but I guess that depends on your water quality. Everything is high quality - I particularly liked the hose which is not the typical plastic hose which kinks easily
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: worked well until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product December 2016. I've changed the filter every six months (4 times). On the fourth filter change the grey part of the shower head seemed to no longer fit tightly to the silver part which screws into the head. This allowed a serious flow of water to escape threw the gap which dramatically restricted the flow by 50 percent. When I push the grey part in the water flow goes back to 100 percent. There is now way to fix this. I've tried all night to repair it but it is now useless. Very disappointed as I had just purchased two more filters for this shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Dirtnapzz

customer_reviews.title: Super Long Neck. . .
customer_reviews.text: I love Culligan products; you can depend on them being exactly what they describe it to be. I only gave 4 stars because the neck on this shower head is SUPER long. So it makes it very tall in the shower not like a normal shower head. If you are a tall person...then this is perfect for you but if you are under 5'5" expect the water to go on top of your head unless you stand far back.
customer_reviews.author: TDB

customer_reviews.title: They arrived perfectly in their packaging and are very easy to install without leaking
customer_reviews.text: I used to get these through Bed Bath and Beyond, but Amazon is so much easier. I recently purchased two to cover both my bathrooms. They arrived perfectly in their packaging and are very easy to install without leaking. The only issue I had was on one of the handles where it attaches to the hose. The plastic portion that screws into the hose was a little defected and wouldn't easily screw in. The grooves weren't right. So I had to use a wrench and superman strength to force it on. It works great and doesn't leak, but I scratched up the metal on the hose in attempt to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Only filters for about a week.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my shower and used a tester to check the chlorine levels. Worked great for the first week. The week after installation I tested it again and the chlorine levels were back to the non filtered levels.
customer_reviews.author: Davidvrtt

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design possible
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had the same thread misalignment issue as others. While the fitting to the wall mount was easy, there was no way to align the hand held unit to the hose further than 1/4 turn. This is not a tape issue, simply a faulty product with a substandard plastic connection. The manufacturer’s video was followed. Without this issue, installing would have been easy. With the flaw,it is unusable. Because my return window had closed before I attempted the install, I have blown $45.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Shogren

customer_reviews.title: Good product with plastic mounting bracket
customer_reviews.text: The product is really working well, but the mounting bracket is made of cheap plastic and its broken now. Also cannot find a way to order a replacement mounting bracket
customer_reviews.author: Shivakumar

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Heavy
customer_reviews.text: The hand held Filtered massage is very pretty and highly chromed . The only complaint I have is that the hand piece is a bit heavy with the filter installed ; otherwise it is easy to install and performs well !
customer_reviews.author: Dino F.

customer_reviews.title: does not remove all chlorine from the water but it ...
customer_reviews.text: does not remove all chlorine from the water but it does make a big difference. I would give 5 stars if the bracket that holds the handle were a bit more substantial. I have had no issues with it but it does seem a bit fragile for bearing the weight of the shower head at the base of the handle.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: my hairdresser recommended that I buy a filtered shower head due to problem hair which she felt was coming from my water source which is well water. The only source of water I have. I have been using this shower head for a couple of months and it has made such a difference in my hair and skin. I searched and searched and read all reviews and decided on the Culligan C135. So far no issues just enjoy the difference it has made with my hair.
customer_reviews.author: MaeMae

customer_reviews.title: I would love a replacement head
customer_reviews.text: Little over a month the screw on the shower head exploded from the handle. I would love a replacement head. Not sure what to do at this point. Would be great if Culligan replaced this part. Don't even know how to reach them, I'm passed the return period on amazon. UPDATE: emailed Culligan, they replaced the part. so boosted the stars for great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: theotherguy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Germany where the water is very hard. We have tried German filters and not been very impressed. After living here for 6 months, I started getting some kind of skin condition thanks to the water I think. The clinic tried to treat me with steroid cream and heavy moisturizers for about two months before I bought this filter. Within two weeks of using this filter, my skin is back to normal and even the scarring has had a chance to clear up. Highly recommend buying this shower head if you have poor quality water!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Shower head holder broke after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the hallway bath used by guests so its not used daily. Since I installed this, the showers been used less than a hundred times and the holder for the shower head broke.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Im not very happy with this shower head. First thing is the very low water pressure that comes out of this thing. I guess I didnt think about the filter in this thing cutting the water pressure to about half of what a regular shower head gives. So if you are a person with a lot of hair on your head, luckily Im not but I used to have long hair, plan on your showers taking longer. My biggest disappointment is the so called 5 way adjustable head. I spent half my first shower turning that thing and couldnt notice but the very very very slightest change of how the water was coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: A little too big and heavy for me.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of filtering the water, but I think the showerhead is too big and heavy. Even after tightening the attachment to the wall pipe, the weight of the showerhead keeps drifting down, and there is a small leak that I can't seem to seal (again, due to the weight of the showerhead). I pretty much need to keep pushing it up every day. That is annoying. Unlike my old and lighter showerhead, I am reluctant to lift it out of it's holder to use as a handheld showerhead, because the weight of it keeps tilting the holder when you place it back. This defeats the purpose of a "handheld" showerhead.
customer_reviews.author: B. Yam

customer_reviews.title: The mounting unit does not support the weight of the ...
customer_reviews.text: The mounting unit does not support the weight of the shower head in certain positions. If you tilt it up to accommodate your height, the weight of the long shower head will tilt the position back down slowly. So it is another example of a cheaply made product. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: veronavirus

customer_reviews.title: I really like having the filter but the shower head itself doesn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing. First shower head lasted 8 months till the hose busted. The second purchase I also had issues with, shower head will not turn to switch to different streams. I really like having the filter but the shower head itself doesn’t last long. Update: second hose broke after 6 months of use. Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: P. Fla

customer_reviews.title: LET THERE BE WATER 🚿
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I didn’t realize how big a difference the filtered water head could make until I bought this! It really makes you notice just how hard and even “scratchy” feeling unfiltered tap water can be. Instantly, I noticed a difference in the water quality. The filtration has helped make my curly hair looser and all the more silky. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ I can’t imagine being without my Culligan now
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Archer

customer_reviews.title: Softener poor
customer_reviews.text: From the water quality test, the left one is from a bottle water; the middle result is on a new filter kit, the right result is from my normal shower, it’s a little bit softer but not as much as I want. After 4+ months usage, the result is kind of better than normal but can’t over 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alien

customer_reviews.title: Really love it!
customer_reviews.text: So this was reccomended to me and I was kind of hesitant on purchasing. Honestly, I felt a difference in the first time I showered. My husband also feels it. We plan to get one for the kids bathroom as well. It is pricy for a shower head and a little heavy but the smell and feeling of the water makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: In my country home, we had a water softner installed, and I loved what it did to my hair and skin. However, in the City, unless your whole building decides to invest in an expensive water softner system, you just have to deal with city water (which isn't bad in NYC, but still...) This shower head filter was a great way to get around this problem. Definitely not the same as a central water sofnter and filter, but it's pretty fantastic. Easy to install. Doesn't leak. Water quality is super! You get a good lather with bar soaps, and it doesn't leave behind all that hard water scum.
customer_reviews.author: Coban MTC LCC

customer_reviews.title: The last one of these I bought was amazing and this one is not as great
customer_reviews.text: The last one of these I bought was amazing and this one is not as great. The joint is way too loose and doesn't keep the handle in an upright position, the pressure of the water is lower and the variations of the settings don't feel as pronounced. The last one I had for five years was great until the ball joint broke, which is to be expected from plastic, so inreordered but I miss my old one so much. Exact same shower head so not sure why quality is so different.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Best "filtered shower" I could find that actually came off onto a hand held piece. It is a little heavy.... Heavier than I expected. I had to purchase a new holder piece that holds the shower head to the main pipe coming out of the wall because the one that came with the set didn't hold up the shower head. I bought the other piece for a few dollars at the local hardware store and it worked great. Takes the chlorine smell and feel out of the water. Piece of the stretchy hose started to leak after about 4 mos....but just annoying dripping not full on spraying.
customer_reviews.author: ChristineA

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Skin and Hair After One Use!!!
customer_reviews.text: From the first time I used this I could tell a HUGE difference. My skin is usually flaky when I get out of the shower, especially in the dry months. After one time of using this shower head my skin was silky smooth. Not to mention how amazing my hair felt!!! Even my 7 year old son kept talking about how soft his skin was now! This is a game changer! I highly recommend this for anyone wanting to take better care of their skin and hair! You will LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was perfect for my needs and budget friendly too
customer_reviews.text: I desperately needed this as the home I just moved to has a high iron level in the well water and was ruining my colored hair. Thank you Culligan! This was perfect for my needs and budget friendly too. I did need help installing but more due to my wrist injury and not because of product difficulty. Have already recommended to many of my friends / family...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping hair soft, preserving high lighted hair, easy to install in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Hair stylist suggested I get this to remove Iron from water that was causing me to get a reddish tint in my blonde hair. She said it would preserve my high lights. It has helped greatly! I also find the water is less harsh and drying on my hair since using the filtered water. It was easy to install and I did it myself within a few minutes. There is a sealing tape to prevent leaking in the package. I didn't see it till had already attached the shower head, so had to unscrew it, add the tape and then put it all back together. Still, easy and quick job. Looks nice in shower. Different setting are handy.
customer_reviews.author: LA_Sinatra

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: It is so heavy and I like to have the water running where I want it not shower where the water chooses to run.It is a nice feature to have filtered shower water but it does get annoying that the head is so heavy it loses it's main purpose..I have to sit under a perpendicular strain of water right next to the wall fixture because the support is not able to hold the shower head in the position that I want it to be.So it's like a "sad" all the time shower head..lol.Don't know about the water quality as I live in Washington state and the water it's pretty clean here...Maybe is just a luxury
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Ivan

customer_reviews.title: the water will fall to the side instead of hitting the sealing like it used to
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that my water pressure got reduced in half, and the filter is brand new. I was expecting some reduction, but not that much, since I had very strong water pressure without it. If I turn the shower head looking up, the water will fall to the side instead of hitting the sealing like it used to.
customer_reviews.author: maria jose

customer_reviews.title: From Hard Water, Dry Skin Nightmare, to Beautifully Clean!
customer_reviews.text: It took me waaay to long to buy this awesome product. I had so much hard water build up on my shower and tub, and had such bad dry, itchy skin, that it was a NIGHTMARE to take a shower. This thing came ready to install! Even included the tape you need for the threads on the pipes. It's a little top-heavy because of the filter, but not a big deal. Great quality, and within a week I noticed a change in my dry, sensitive skin. I would highly recommend it to anyone with hard water, or anyone just wanting to filter their shower water! It's ALWAYS better for your skin and hair to have a filter!
customer_reviews.author: Rib

customer_reviews.title: The hand held shower head is VERY heavy. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The hand held shower head is VERY heavy. I don't hold on to it when taking a shower, but I want to have the option to spray water at other places. I wish the water from the shower head can spread wider, so I don't feel so cold in the winter when taking a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Z

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Its chrome color is probably its most pleasing feature. I had high hopes for this shower head filter, but it has led to nothing but frustration. I purchased this on 10/30/17. By 11/11/17 the pressure of water flowing through had decreased. It's nearly impossible to adjust/switch between the flow settings. I haven't noticed any perceptible difference in my skin or hair. I purchased a Sprite brand hand held shower filter a few years ago which works better than this Culligan filter/softener, but lacked the water softening feature. I'm glad that I didn't spend much on this Culligan shower filter.
customer_reviews.author: TSHE

customer_reviews.title: Use a wrench to tighten, not your  hands.
customer_reviews.text: The head is super heavy but i guess that's the price you pay. Otherwise, it's great. For those of you who complain about the head drooping, it's because you you hand-tightened the connection for the holder. You really do need a wrench (put something over the joint before you use the wrench, to protect the chrome) and a strong person to turn said wrench.
customer_reviews.author: OwlK

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Has saved my hair immensely. My hair and skin were so dry and fragile from hard water and when I’d wash my hair prior to this shower head it would almost be greater than it was when I went in the shower. This helped soften my hair and skin as cleanse it
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Wall

customer_reviews.title: The Jury is Still Out....
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Very easy to install and has GREAT water pressure. Cons - Not sure it is filtering the hard water that I have. I have very hard water in my residence. I have tried the GE shower filter which was great with filtering the hard water. However, it made the shower pressure extremely weak. This was frustrating as I have a lot of thick hair to rinse and it would make my showers too long. I have only used this Culligan twice and so far, I can tell by my hair texture and feel that it may not be filtering as well as the GE filter.
customer_reviews.author: iceclaws72

customer_reviews.title: Water Softener Alternative
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations. We decided to try out this shower head instead of paying to have a water softener. We have horribly hard water, calcium lime rust you name it we had it. Both me and my wife noticed a difference immediately, and have had no lime build up so far! Highly recommended for anyone searching for a hard water remedy for their shower that doesn’t want to spend hundreds of dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Palmer

customer_reviews.title: The shower head is great! Except for the fact this it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: The shower head is great! Except for the fact this it is a little heavy, the water pressure, the water quality including the smell is much better than it was before. I live in a region where I get hard water, so my hair as always felt dry after I showered. But now, my hair definitely feels softer and better. I can't wait to see the difference the water will make on my skin when winter comes!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful for the first 6 months. Then the rubber head got clogged and now it will only come out through one of the settings. This is after changing the filter every 6 months. We've only had it for a year now. Disappointed because I was hoping to have this for a few years before having to deal with the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Zeamer

customer_reviews.title: 8 years and counting!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2008 and it still works just fine! Good alternative to pushing out chemicals (Lye, Chlorine). Usually replace the filter about every six months. I'm sure there are other more enhance shower filters. But since I've had this one for so long I figured the longevity is worth mentioning here!
customer_reviews.author: eMan-DX

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I can’t seem to figure out how to get the different spray settings (only seems to be two actual settings despite the dial turning the five times for the claimed settings) but my hair has never been softer! Update: there was a little purple stopper somewhere in the apparatus that was severely inhibiting the water pressure; once I removed that, the different settings came to life. Updating to five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Instructions to Remove Flow Restrictor
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend likes the showerhead but I don’t feel a difference in the water. The water pressure was better than I thought it would be since everyone recommended removing the flow restrictor. I finally removed it and the difference it pressure was pretty huge. Anyways the instructions in the reviews are all different and unhelpful. Here’s how to remove the flow restrictor. The flow restrictor is purple, located at the base of the showerhead where it connects to the “pipe”/showerhead extender. Use a pair of needle nose pliers to pull out and remove. You might be able to use a tweezers too. It’s not difficult to remove. Screw it back onto the “pipe” and you’re done.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Rough start but great product so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this shower head for a short time but I am very happy with it. Initially, there was an issue with the original that was sent to me. The package arrived with broken components. I contacted the company threw amazon and was contacted by the company right away. The issued a replacement and I received it the very next day. I am extremely happy with how it was handled. I have noticed that my skin isn't as dry as before and my hair color is not washing out as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Loranca

customer_reviews.title: Good filter, bad showerhead.
customer_reviews.text: The filter is great but the quality of the showerhead is not good. Too much weight on the part that holds the head causes issues to the bracket. Also, within just a couple of months, it is almost impossible to spin the head to change the setting. Overall, it seems to be made with cheap materials. We are not pleased and will be looking into other options.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Epperhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when you don’t want a whole house water softener
customer_reviews.text: This has made all the difference for my hair. We have very hard water, which would leave my curly hair dry and frizzy. I didn’t want to spend the money on installing a whole house water softening system, and this was the perfect solution. My hair is back to being soft and healthy looking!
customer_reviews.author: Elise McKenna

customer_reviews.title: When it falls you better hope your head or any part of your body ...
customer_reviews.text: WARNING Shower head holder has a small black grip inside where you place hand held shower. If that grip moves or comes off the hand held will fall out of holder. When it falls you better hope your head or any part of your body is not in its way. POOR design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work in any way
customer_reviews.text: For one the instructions on amazon are different than in the package. The package says run HOT water through it for 2 minutes, and the description on here says run any temperature water through it for 10 minutes. I did both initially and the PPM did not change in any way. I decided to give it a couple showers to see if anything changed and it did not. It also greatly decreases the water pressure, which I would deal with if it made any difference. It didn’t leak for me at all but that doesn’t change that it’s worthless
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Children
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my toddler who I wanted to give clean baths . I didn't like the filter balls because they didn't work as well and would break . This is perfect for a bath or giving uour little one a small little shower! He loves it ans I love it because I know it's all clear and clean water ! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a stand under the shower head type of person. I like to hold it while I wash, or use it to stand outside the stall and wash my hair. But the filter works great. My hair doesn't shed at all anymore and I've had it for going on 4 months and haven't had to replace the filter yet. I have roommates, so it's used allot. Good longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Installation took about 15 minutes - Teflon tape is included, so no need to buy this if you don’t already have it at home. The water pressure is better than anticipated, though there is a trade-off between filtered water and high pressure. The adjustable settings allow you to customize the flow and pattern of the water stream. Overall, this is a high quality product without a high cost and is the best option for avoiding hard water deposits.
customer_reviews.author: William Rogers

customer_reviews.title: This product is AWESOME! This product was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This product is AWESOME! This product was easy to install, works as described, and I can feel the difference between my water before and after. I feel so much better using this for my family than a department store product or the standard shower most houses come with. I also enjoyed how easy it is to replace the filter when needed. I will definitely be looking forward to the continued usage of this product and recommending to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Valentino

customer_reviews.title: really helped!
customer_reviews.text: love this shower head, bought this for my kid's bathroom as i wanted to cut down the chlorine/chemicals they're exposed to and this fit the bill. i also bought a different style by the same company which uses the same filter for our bathroom and i truly notice a difference in the texture of my hair and skin. i would highly recommend this if you do not have a central filtration system for your home. this particular model has a nice variety of settings as well.
customer_reviews.author: krissi

customer_reviews.title: It’s too heavy,
customer_reviews.text: This thing works as intended, but when full of water it’s quite heavy. The weight causes the holder to sag and it fell out and almost hit my foot, which would probably have broken a bone. Dangerous! I took it down and ordered another model.
customer_reviews.author: D.  Cullen

customer_reviews.title: I need a return label
customer_reviews.text: I received a code but no label. I need to return the item. I ordered it by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The filter for the sink is awful and doesn’t last at all. This however works awesome and does last the recommended time. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Buglady

customer_reviews.title: This really works on even the hardest water!
customer_reviews.text: Having hard water was a big change for my skin and hair. We did not want to go to a whole house system, but I was skeptical that a shower filter would do what I wanted it to do. This completely solved my problem! My hair is back to felling clean and shiny and my skin is not as dry. Plus I don't smell like a penny from the iron all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: a total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I installed the first one i got and wanted to try it out before installing this one in my other shower, the first product is a failure, it does nothing to clean or purify the water, it reduces water pressure. a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Buthayna

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far....
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great purchase, love the water pressure and it seems like it is filtering out the hard water.
customer_reviews.author: JanetP

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Mounting Bracket
customer_reviews.text: It is only been couple of month since I fitted this shower and the mounting bracket no more will stand upright. Although quality of water does seem to have improved the faulty mounting bracket reduces the usability to a very large extend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit comes with cartridge
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have a hand held shower to rinse off and the filter removing chemicals helps with dry skin in the winter
customer_reviews.author: chet

customer_reviews.title: Hand Shower Water Softner
customer_reviews.text: Durable easy to change filter looks a little cheap but not to bad. Water pressure stronger and water softener but remember you get what you pay for so fair for the money
customer_reviews.author: epaguia

customer_reviews.title: left my hair feeling dirty
customer_reviews.text: I heard how this product helped quality of hair...fix chlorine, and frizz. I installed this and even after a fresh shampoo and extra long rinse, the back of my head remained waxy/shiny. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Clark

product_meta.title: Culligan HSH-C135 Hand-Held Filtered Massage Showerhead, 10,000 Gallon, Chrome
product_meta.description:
Culligan HSH-C135 Hand Held Filtered Showerhead, Chrome Finish

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Culligan HSH-C135 hand held showerhead reduces sulfur odor, chlorine & scale for softer, cleaner skin and hair. The anti-clog rubber spray nozzle has a unique hand-held design, which includes a metal shower hose which allows you to reach isolated muscles for a massage, you can choose from five spray setting for comfort. The easy to install shower head requires no tools for easy installation, 10,000 gallon/ 6 month filter capacity (maximum flow rate of 2.5 gpm as required by ASME standards). Certified to meet NSF standard 177 for filtered showerhead systems and a 5 year limited warranty. Filter change reminder sticker included
feature_bullets: Features reduces chlorine & scale for softer cleaner skin & hair

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars752 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
